title.narrative: IA PG2 Liberia Eye Health project

description.narrative: The project aims to contribute towards increased access to eye care by supporting direct service delivery with a focus on screening and treatment (cataract surgeries and refractive error)

participating-org.narrative: Ireland - Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade
Phebe Hospital and School of Nursing

receiver-org.narrative: Phebe Hospital and School of Nursing
Phebe Hospital and School of Nursing
